channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Bank Holiday Beauty Deals
channel.desc: Enjoy the long weekend with a fabulous selection of Bank Holiday deals, spanning skincare, make-up, haircare, tanning and more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Feel Good & Glow Beauty
channel.desc: Feel Good & Glow Beauty.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Bank Holiday Beauty Deals
channel.desc: Enjoy the long weekend with a fabulous selection of Bank Holiday deals, spanning skincare, make-up, haircare, tanning and more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tili Beauty
channel.desc: Effortlessly update your daily beauty routine with Tili, from beauty tools and everyday essentials, to expert developed fitness and wellbeing items, we've got you covered. Try it, love it with Tili.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: New In Beauty
channel.desc: Discover the latest and greatest innovations in beauty as our experts guide you through new and exciting products arriving in the New Year.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Bank Holiday Beauty Deals
channel.desc: Enjoy the long weekend with a fabulous selection of Bank Holiday deals, spanning skincare, make-up, haircare, tanning and more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: NassifMD Skincare
channel.desc: Join us for this exciting beauty range developed by Dr Nassif. Discover products designed to boost your skin's natural radiance and appearance, delivering remarkable results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tarte Cosmetics
channel.desc: This show features high performance natural products from Tarte Cosmetics, including everything from Amazonian clay to maracuja oil. Find a wide variety of glamorous eco-chic products you'll love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Day Deals
channel.desc: Discover a host of top offers from some big names in our Beauty Day event.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: L'Occitane
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Hair by Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Internationally renowned Philip Kingsley and his team give expert tips and tricks on how to get the best results for your hair and scalp.

channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.
